section.title: Test Campaign Details
section.p: This form displays the details for the currently selected test campaign.

section.title: Test Cases
section.p: This table lists all the test cases associated with the current test campaign.
To execute a test case, click the 'Add Result' button in the 'Actions' column of this table.
Table results can be filtered by entering a search term in the filter box at the top of each column. Filter options are: '=': equal to, '!=': not equal to, and '~': contains

section.title: Export
section.p: Export All: Exports all the information pertaining to all test cases
Export View : Exports filtered test cases.

section.title: Advanced Search
section.p: Displays the test case 'Advanced Search' widget.

section.title: Pass Rate
section.p: Displays a stacked progress bar of test execution results. By hovering over each result bar a tooltip will display more information
